verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Ghost, you wonderful Holy Ghost,
A wind blowing strong,
Blowing from heaven
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have decided to go,
All the way with our God.
Revival in the land that's our goal.
As soldiers in His army,
We'll fight with heart and soul.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blood and fire,
We call upon blood and fire,
A stream flowing strong,
Flowing from Heaven.
